tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother in law, Mrs Santosh has been consulting Dr Das from a very long time. I am writing review on her behalf. Dr Das is a very patient listener and very soft spoken. He explains the issue in a way that the patient can understand very well and doesn't get scared of the diagnosis. We need more such people in health care industry who genuinely care for their patient's health. She has the deepest respect and regards for him and trusts his opinion all health related matters. She sends her blessings and best wishes to Dr Das.

I had been visiting Dr.Das for the last 20 years ( which ever hospital he was available during this period), he is not only a best listener but identify the problem very quickly but minimum required tests. I am maintaining my BP with single dose with minimum potency for the past 20 years, I had utilized his services for my mothers ( 85 years) heart problem last year,  she was in  crictical condition, she is now almost fit because his great guidance and treatments in hospital and also in OPD,
I wish his long life with good health

A gem in the field of cardiology and not less than GOD for me.
He respects his patients, makes them feel comfortable, listen them carefully and finally treat them with love and care.

Half of your illness is gone once you enter his cabin...and then he treats the remaining half :-)

I'm very much impressed with the way he attends the patients...his smiling face and respectful voice. Most of the magic happens here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ********* ****** *** has the patience to listen to what a patient has to say. And in the process he gains thorough understanding of what treatment is required. I ve been visiting him for the last several years, and I have no hesitation in recommending him.

He listened to our problem patiently, even in this time of chaos and panic all around where everyone is in a hurry. He was calm and treated us professionally resolving all our doubts, have a follow up with him after 1 month, I highly recommend him to others.

We have been going to Dr Das for more than 10 years. It is mostly my mother who goes for her regular check ups. I make it a point to get his opinion on my overall health whenever I visit my mother in India. Apart from being an ace Cardiologist, he is also a very helpful person. A combination that is very difficult if not impossible to find.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The most important aspects any patient is looking for from a doctor is a patient hearing of the issues involved, getting an accurate diagnosis and a detailed and honest explanation to the satisfaction of the patient. Dr Arvind Das provided us with all of the above. Besides being a competent doctor he was extremely friendly yet thoroughly professional.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Is super person .. Takes pain in ur case to the best possible way .. Friendly behaviour .. WILL HIGHLY RECOMMEND ..
Absolutely speechless, great Dr. I loved his way  of explanation. One must visit to Mr das for any heart related issues.
An excellent doctor. Have been going to him for years. Calm and thorough. Does not over medicate. I trust him implicitly.
